'''Well Done, Stierlitz!''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is earned by completing the World Quest ''[[Undetected Infiltration]]''.

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*{{w|Stierlitz}} is the main character of a Russian spy and espionage series written by {{w|Yulian Semyonov}}, where Stierlitz is an undercover agent in Berlin during World War II and sabotages Nazi Germany's war efforts. Its most popular adaption is the TV series ''{{w|Seventeen Moments of Spring}}''.
